com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay

Class NMapPathDataOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.NMapOverlay
      • com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay.NMapPathDataOverlay

  • public class NMapPathDataOverlay
extends NMapOverlay
    Wrapper class for a path data overlay on map view.

      • setOnLoadDataDelegate

        public void setOnLoadDataDelegate(NMapPathDataOverlay.OnLoadDataDelegate delegate)

      • addPathData

        public void addPathData(NMapPathData pathData)
        Add a new instance of NMapPathData on this overlay. If pathData does not have path line style, default style is used.
        Parameters:
        pathData - pathData is to be drawn on this overlay

      • addCircleData

        public void addCircleData(NMapCircleData circleData)
        Add a new instance of NMapCircleData on this overlay. If circleData does not have circle style, default style is used.
        Parameters:
        circleData - circleData is to be drawn on this overlay

      • setLineWidth

        public void setLineWidth(float width)
        set line width to the default line style.
        Parameters:
        width - line width in dp

      • setLineColor

        public void setLineColor(int rgb,
                         int alpha)
        set line color with alpha to the default line style.
        Parameters:
        rgb - line color in rgb
        alpha - alpha

      • showAllPathData

        public void showAllPathData(int zoomLevel)
        Show all path data.
        Parameters:
        zoomLevel - 0 to show all path data in the NMapView, otherwise it is centered with the given zoom level.

      • hasPathData

        public boolean hasPathData()
        Overrides:
        hasPathData in class NMapOverlay
        Returns:
        true if this overlay has path data to be rendered using Canvas.drawPath() or drawCircle() etc.

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                 NMapView mapView,
                 boolean shadow)
        Draw the path data. Overrides: draw() in class NMapOverlay
        Overrides:
        draw in class NMapOverlay
        Parameters:
        canvas - The Canvas upon which to draw. Note that this may already have a transformation applied, so be sure to leave it the way you found it.
        mapView - the NMapView that requested the draw. Use NMapView.getProjection() to convert between on-screen pixels and latitude/longitude pairs.
        shadow - flag to indicate draw shadow or not.
